Package etc.aloe.cscw2013

Class Summary
CostTrainingImpl Provides training of a cost-sensitive support vector machine (SMO) classifier.
CrossValidationPrepImpl<T extends LabelableItem> Provides stratification and randomization for use before cross validation.
CrossValidationSplitImpl<T extends LabelableItem> Given a stratified list of instances, extracts testing and training sets for specific folds of cross validation.
DownsampleBalancing Balances a data set via downsampling.
EvaluationImpl Evaluates a set of labeled examples given some predicted labels.
FeatureExtractionImpl Applies an existing feature specification to a data set to get a new data set with features extracted.
FeatureGenerationImpl Generates a set of filters that extract the desired features from message texts.
LabelMappingImpl Given predicted labels, applies them to the given segments and their messages.
NullSegmentation Performs no segmentation.
ResolutionImpl A basic disagreement resolution strategy for labeling segments.
SMOFeatureWeighting Extracts top features and feature weights from a linear support vector machine (SMO) classifier.
ThresholdSegmentation Segments messages according to a time threshold.
TrainingImpl Performs basic training of a linear support vector machine classifier.
UpsampleBalancing Applies an upsampling algorithm to balance a data set.
